job_description: Company Profile: Optigo Networks makes smart buildings smarter. As a leader in connectivity for smart buildings, Optigo Networks provides a complete solution to protect, connect and manage today’s most advanced buildings. Layered on top of this platform, Optigo’s integrated analytics and security engine ensures the building network is protected and operates trouble-free.Buildings around the world are quickly realizing that buildings require a specialized network for building devices, as intelligence is added to their operations. Optigo Networks is the only company positioned as a leader in building connectivity in this Internet of Things, providing a secure and simple-to-manage networking platform for physical security and building automation.Learn more at www.optigo.net.The Role: We seek an engineering student to join our fast-paced team for a 4- or 8- month term starting May 2015Key Duties and Responsibilities: Project-based tasks will be assigned and managed by the systems group. Projects may be concurrent and ongoing as schedules and changes in workflow unfold, as typical for a start-up. Potential projects and tasks include:- Developing and implementing test plans/scripts for Gigabit networking devices- Creating and enhancing automated test environments- Software testing and debug on embedded systems- Product support, testing and validation
job_requirements: Requirements:- Capable of ramping up quickly and a willingness to learn new technologies- Good analytical, problem solving and communication skills- Familiarity with Linux as a development environment- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment- Good analytical, problem solving and communication skills- NSERC Eligible with solid academic performance and organizational skillsAdditional Desired Skills:- Ability to adapt to changing workflows and priorities, independently or as part of a team- Desire to work in a start-up environment with other like-minded individuals- Knowledge of networking (TCP/IP, Ethernet) preferredOpen To All Majors:No
